framework.full_name: The Quantum Indeterministic Framework for Neural Security
framework.subtitle: A Model for Quantum Neural Interfaces
framework.name: QIF — Quantum Indeterministic Framework for Neural Security
framework.tagline: Life's most important connections deserve the most thought.
framework.mission: Brain-computer interfaces are here — and they have no universal security standard. This framework provides the shared language that makes an entire industry of neural security possible.
framework.description: A ground-up architectural redesign of BCI security, built from neuroscience constraints. The funnel model, quantum integer, and defense-in-depth rings for quantum neural interfaces.
framework.vision: A world where brain-computer interfaces are as secure as they are powerful. Where neural data is protected by law and by design. Where the boundary between mind and machine is guarded by open standards, with security and privacy built in from inception.

tara.description: A neural security stack for BCI security monitoring, simulation, and attack testing. Real-time security analysis for brain-computer interfaces.
